Established in 1958, we are a California classic and have been barbers to the famous, infamous, and influential. Today our products are based on original formulas, developed through research and close customer relationships. We strongly believe that a cultivated gentleman is one that knows how to treat himself right.
Our exacting standards for men’s grooming are based on the barbering philosophy of Chris Robinson. Today the company maintains a reputation as a world – renowned barbershop offering treatments and services for the cultivated gentlemen. Costa Barber Shop is also known for high quality shaving and grooming products that are refined to the needs of a gentlemen.
" ct_info_area_header_color="#ffffff" ct_info_area_text_color="#cccccc" ct_info_area_background_color="#313131"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: crob
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Welcome to Lavender Spa & Wellness Center offering you the finest in spa, skincare, beauty and wellness.

From state-of-the-art diamond facials to holistic wellness therapies and cutting edge fitness classes, to world class salon services, our Beverly Hills spa stands ready to offer you your most memorable spa experience in a serene sanctuary nestled nearby the exclusive shops and magnificent dining of vibrant Rodeo Drive.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/4"][ct-profile ct_profile_name="Jill Johnson" ct_profile_position="Founder" ct_profile_quote="``My passion is knowing my craft inside and out``" ct_profile_image="2277"][/vc_column][vc_column width="3/4"][vc_column_text]Meet our Founder Jill Johnson is a Licensed Esthetician and owner of Lavender Spa & Wellness Center, a company dedicated to providing manageable and accessible solutions to every ones skincare needs. Jill Johnson is a certified Lash Artist and Acne Specialist. Inspired by the splendor of the traditional Spanish Colonial Revival style architecture prevalent San Diego, our premier 20,000 square foot urban oasis is comprehensive, warmly appointed and luxurious. Our mission is to make effective skincare as accessible as possible to everyone. We believe skincare is not just a luxury for special occasions, but an essential part of a healthy lifestyle. We are passionate about providing the absolute best service to our clients. Education is a constant and excellent service is the pursuit.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][ct-hero ct_hero_bg_image="2478"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Acne Treatment and Coaching Lavender Spa & Wellness Center specializes in proven, effective acne treatment. We know acne and will get you clear! One of our many professional acne specialists will sit down with you and prepare a game plan to get your acne under control and keep it at bay. They'll will diagnose your specific acne type (inflamed, non-inflamed, hormonal) and identify lifestyle choices that may be causing your acne. We will design a customized home-care routine using products with “acne safe” ingredients and set up a treatment schedule that fits your budget. Don’t put off having great skin– Let our acne specialist help you get your acne under control today! Corrective Skincare with Visible Results At Lavender Spa & Wellness Center, we focus on helping you achieve your skin goals and helping your skin look its best and healthiest. Whether you need to get your breakouts under control, want to fade lingering acne marks, fade hyper pigmentation or want help improving the look of fine lines and sun damaged skin, we will help you reach those goals. Lashes We custom design every set to match the client's natural lashes and desired look. We never overload your natural lashes and only use lengths and thickness suitable for you allowing you to safely wear eyelash extensions week after week, month after month with no damage to your natural lashes.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Skin Care
item.dc:creator: crob
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Good skin care is essential to graceful aging.

Skin care is one of the most important components of natural beauty, no matter what your age, skin tone, or skin type. At Lavender Spa & Wellness Center we aim to provide you with all the resources & services you need to take good care of your skin. We understand how important your skin is - not just for you to look good, but for your overall health as well.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image="137" img_size="full" alignment="center"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Customized Facial " ct_service_price="$55" ct_service_description="Beginning with a hot towel treatment to the face, cleanser, exfoliation, and mask treatment according to your skin needs, ending with a relaxing scalp, neck, and face massage."][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Treatment Program" ct_service_price="Inquire" ct_service_description="Fabulash & Faces has treatment programs to treat mild to moderate cases of hyper-pigmentation. This is an eight to twelve week treatment program, which combines in-office treatments with a home care regimen and will result in significant improvement of your condition. This program includes peels spaced at intervals to lighten the skin."][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Slow & Glow Treatment " ct_service_price="$55" ct_service_description="This is the least aggressive peel, removing only the outer layer of the skin with no real visible peeling. Repeated treatments on a regular basis (Ideally 1 time per month, and up to once a week to correct damage) will cause mild exfoliation of the skin with cumulative effects. Mild, yet refining."][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Ultra Peel Treatment " ct_service_price="$65" ct_service_description="This peel may be administered every 4 weeks if needed. Skin exfoliation starts within two to three days of treatment. The first few days your skin feels dry and tight. The drier your skin is, the longer it takes for peeling to begin. Oily-skinned people start peeling sooner. Light flaking will occur, similar to a sunburn peel."][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Micropeel" ct_service_price="$85" ct_service_description="A gentle exfoliating treatment beginning with dermaplaning, then utilizing a chemical peel to improve the overall appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, pore size, acne and sun damage with the use of a combination of 5% TCA, 5% mandelic, and 5% lactic, as well as azelaic and kojic acids. Excellent for acne-prone or hyper-pigmented skin without excessive irritation or dehydration."][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Dermaplaning/Skin Leveling" ct_service_price="$35" ct_service_description="An extremely gentle resurfacing treatment that removes the outer most layers of dead skin cells and fine facial hair, leaving the skin very soft and smooth."][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Neck and Décolleté" ct_service_price="$65" ct_service_description="Chemical Peel to address the concerns of the breast-to-collarbone region. Treating the neck and décolleté is a concern is not just for mature clients but for younger clients who want to preserve and slow down the aging process."][ct-services ct_service_title="Neck and Décolleté" ct_service_price="Add On $45" ct_service_description="For clients already receiving another peel treatment on the same day."][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Teen Clean" ct_service_price="$55" ct_service_description="Get your teen started on the path to healthy skin by introducing them to facials. We will educate your son or daughter on the importance of caring for their skin and give them tools to begin properly caring for the largest organ of their body. Includes light extractions, if necessary. For acne treatments, please see our Acne Clinic menu."][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]
Facial Enhancements
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Eyelash Tint/Brow Tint" ct_service_price="$25/$15" ct_service_description="Lash and brow tinting is one of the top 5 most popular salon / spa treatments worldwide. We use tinting products that use only all natural ingredients and contain no coal tar or other prohibited materials. The patented formulation guarantees quality, long-lasting results. We custom blend the perfect color for you."][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Hydrating Eye/Lip Mask" ct_service_price="$5" ct_service_description="Hydration is the key to getting rid of unwanted puffiness, dryness and fine lines! Give your eyes a wake up and get your lips kissably plump!"][ct-services ct_service_title="Eyelash & Brow Tint" ct_service_price="$35" ct_service_description="Go ahead and do them both, you'll be glad you did."][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image="2674" img_size="full" alignment="center"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Beardbrand premium beard oil is the highest quality blend of carrier oils that are combined with essential oils. Together, they give facial hair both a fabulous scent and a healthy appearance. Designed to be very lightweight, our oils keep your beard conditioned and shiny. In addition, our beard oils help to soften, hydrate, and condition your beard while minimizing or eliminating dandruff. The lightweight blend won't weigh down your beard or make it feel greasy. Simply put, our beard oil is the best on the market.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_single_image image="2694" img_size="full" alignment="center"][/vc_column][vc_column width="3/4"][ct-products ct_product_title="Beard Oil" ct_product_price="$29" ct_product_description="
Bring out the woodsman in you. This beard oil has been cultivated by months of research and made with only the finest natural blends of oils. Simply put, it is the best beard oil on the market. The Beardbrand beard oil is designed to be very lightweight and will help keep your beard conditioned and shiny. Because it's a lightweight blend, it won't weigh down your beard or feel greasy.
" ct_product_title_color="#313131" ct_product_price_color="#81d742" ct_productprice="$20"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image="2696" img_size="ct-featured-image-full-width" alignment="center"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Policies
item.dc:creator: crob
item.content:encoded:
Providing the best possible service during your visit is our highest priority. Time allotted for your appointment is reserved especially for you! We respect your time and ask the same of you.
Rescheduling & Cancellation Policy: Clients are expected to provide a full 24 hours notice when rescheduling their appointment to avoid a cancellation fee of 50% of the scheduled service.
No Show Policy: Clients who fail to show up for their appointment will be responsible for the full cost of treatment.
Late Arrival Policy: Arriving more than 20 minutes late is considered a “No Show.” We may not have time to perform your treatment and you will be responsible for the full cost of the treatment. Please call if you are running late.
Appointment Confirmations & Reminders: You will receive an email and/or text confirmation at the time of booking and an email and/or text reminder 24 hours before your appointment.
Product Return Policy: Unopened products may be returned for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Used products may be returned for product credit within 14 days of purchase.
We understand that things come up that prevent you from making it to your appointment and schedule adjustments are necessary. When you cancel on short notice, it prevents another client who needs treatment from coming in during that time spot. If you must cancel, be sure to give 24 hours notice or you will be charged the cancellation fee of 50% of the service.
Exceptions are made in certain cases such as emergencies and illness. If you are sick, please stay home.

item.title: Acne Treatment
item.dc:creator: crob
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

We know acne and will help you get clear and stay clear. No prescription drugs needed.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image="115" img_size="full" alignment="center"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Acne Treatment and Consultation" ct_service_price="$149*" ct_service_description=" For First Time Acne Clients. Our acne specialist will diagnose your acne sub-type (inflamed, non-inflamed, combination or rosacea) and identify lifestyle choices and products that may be aggravating your acne. After a thorough skin analysis, we will perform comprehensive extractions and do a light chemical peel or exfoliating enzyme to kick-start the clearing process. Lastly, we will create a customized home-care routine using products with “acne safe” ingredients (this may consist of products you already have) and set up a treatment schedule that works with your budget. *includes the cost of a full-size Face Reality cleanser and moisturizer to get you started with your new skincare routine. "][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Acne Treatment" ct_service_price="$65" ct_service_description="For Established Acne Clients. Face acne treatment involves deep cleansing with an exfoliating enzyme or light chemical peel and extractions. Exfoliation and extractions allow home-care products to penetrate the pores more easily and facilitate the clearing process."][ct-services ct_service_title="Back Acne Treatment" ct_service_price="$75" ct_service_description="For Established Acne Clients $75 alone or $45 added on to an acne treatment. Back acne treatment involves deep cleansing, exfoliating enzyme or light chemical peel and extractions."][ct-services ct_service_title="Acne Program Graduate" ct_service_price="$55" ct_service_description="For clients who have been given Graduation Paperwork and are in Maintenance Phase for their acne-care. "][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Before & After

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="126" img_size="full" alignment="center"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="127" img_size="full" alignment="center"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="128" img_size="full" alignment="center"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_btn title="Acne Treatment FAQ" style="flat" align="center" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fcontempothemes.com%2Fwp-beauty%2Fday-spa-demo%2Facne-treatment%2Facne-treatment-faq%2F|||" button_block="true"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Lashes
item.dc:creator: crob
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

The eyes have it. For longer, thicker, luscious, more natural looking eyelashes, you deserve the advantage of Eyelash Extensions.

A global leading breakthrough, unlike traditional false eyelashes, eyelash flares or implants, these revolutionary extensions are designed to mimic your natural eyelashes. As lovers of all animals we only use faux mink in all our lash extensions, which also holds its shape better and lasts longer than real mink. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image="122" img_size="full" alignment="center"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Tiffany (1 hour)" ct_service_price="$75" ct_service_description="Luxurious faux mink lash extensions are applied to the outer edges of each eye and a ``cat-eye`` effect is created, ideal for a special occasion. Perfect for a ``POP`` Add On (see below). *Only available for High School/College students with current valid ID"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Natural Beauty (1 hour)" ct_service_price="$125" ct_service_description="An express classic one to one application across the entire upper lash resulting in an effect similar to a light coating of black mascara with additional length and curl to the natural lashes."][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="FabuLASH (2 hrs)" ct_service_price="$195" ct_service_description="Limited Time Special $149* includes your 1 fill ($55 value). This is our most popular lash service. Lash extensions, applied to EVERY lash, result in an effect similar to a thick, glossy coating of black mascara. It's an ultra glam look, with serious length, volume and curl. Suitable for ladies of all ages. Shorter lash extensions can be used for those who prefer a more delicate look."][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Fabulash XXL (2½ hours)" ct_service_price="$250" ct_service_description="Creating the ULTIMATE in fullness and design, we apply volume fans of 2-4 extensions applied to one natural lash giving you the fullest, most luxurious set of extensions available. Includes your 1st fill ($75 value)"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Men’s Executive (1 hour)" ct_service_price="$95" ct_service_description="Smart & savvy men are starting to understand just how much eyelash extensions can brighten their eyes and make them look more awake, friendly and youthful. We carry hundreds of different types of lashes in a variety of shapes and colors. From light & undetectable to perfectly defined, we can design lashes to match your desires."][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Pop Add On" ct_service_price="$10*" ct_service_description="Add an extra ``POP`` to your special event by adding accents of colored, glitter, ombre or crystal lashes. Add On prices START at $10."][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="2–4 week fill (1 hour)" ct_service_price="$55" ct_service_description=" To keep lash extensions full and looking beautiful, maintenance (fill) appointments are needed every 2-4 weeks. The longevity of your extensions will vary based upon your natural lash growth cycle. This applies to all 1 hour fills EXCEPT XXL sets. "][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="XXL Fill (1 ½ hrs)" ct_service_price=" $75" ct_service_description="To keep your XXL lashes full and looking beautiful, fill appointments are needed every 2-4 weeks to maintain your beautiful XXL lashes."][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Lash Fluff (30 minutes) " ct_service_price="$35" ct_service_description="2 - 3 days prior to a Special Event, schedule a 30 minute Lash Fluff to fill in between your regularly scheduled fill to make sure you look your absolute best. NOTE: This is for established clients only."][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Emergency Extension Removal" ct_service_price="$65" ct_service_description="If you are in the unfortunate situation of having been a recipient of a eyelash extension disaster, we are here to help. I believe your extensions should be painless and beautiful. We will work together to bring your lashes to a healthier state."][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Eyelash Tint/Brow Tint" ct_service_price="$25/$15" ct_service_description="Lash and brow tinting is one of the top 5 most popular salon / spa treatments worldwide. We use tinting products that use only all natural ingredients and contain no coal tar or other prohibited materials. The patented formulation guarantees quality, long-lasting results. We custom blend the perfect color for you."][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Eyebrow & Eye Lash Tint" ct_service_price="$35" ct_service_description="Go ahead and do them both, you'll be glad you did."][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Before & After

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="123" img_size="full" alignment="center"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="124" img_size="full" alignment="center"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="118" img_size="full" alignment="center"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_btn title="Lash Extension FAQ" style="flat" align="center" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fcontempothemes.com%2Fwp-beauty%2Fday-spa-demo%2Flashes%2Flash-extension-faq%2F|||" button_block="true"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.dc:creator: crob
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Hair Removal is a personal and intimate choice.

Rest assured, we will use only the best products and techniques while keeping your service professional and as discreet as possible. Your comfort and satisfaction are our main objectives. For hair removal services not listed below, please contact us for a consultation and price.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image="134" img_size="full" alignment="center"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title=" Lip, Chin or Brow Clean Up" ct_service_price="$12" ct_service_description="Removing hair that doesn't belong there is what we do! Eyebrow Clean Up is for cleaning away stray hairs and upkeep if you are a regular client. For eyebrow styling and 1st time clients, please book an Eyebrow Styling appointment."][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Eyebrow Styling" ct_service_price="$18" ct_service_description="Eyebrow Clean Up is for cleaning away stray hairs and upkeep if you are a regular client. For eyebrow styling and 1st time clients, please book an Eyebrow Styling appointment."][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Nose" ct_service_price=" $12" ct_service_description="Do not be alarmed! "][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Neck/Ears/Cheeks" ct_service_price="$12" ct_service_description="Choose 1 for the listed price. NOTE: We do NOT remove the beard area for males, this causes damage to the skin. Outer ear and ridge of the ear. Cheeks ABOVE the beard area on males or any part thereof for the ladies."][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Full Face" ct_service_price="$50" ct_service_description="From the eyebrows down to the neck - whatever needs to go, goes. (EXCLUDING Men's beards)."][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Underarms" ct_service_price="$22" ct_service_description="Sugar Sweet! Lift those arms in confidence! No stubble, fly-aways or skin shadow from shaving."][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Full Arms/Half Arms" ct_service_price="$35/$30" ct_service_description="Full Arm includes: Shoulders down, hands and fingers, too Half Arm includes: (choose either) Elbow to the shoulders, OR Elbow down including hands and fingers."][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][ct-services ct_service_title="Full Leg/Half Leg" ct_service_price="$60/$35" ct_service_description="Full Leg includes: Upper Thigh all the way down to the feet and toes. item.title: Policies
item.dc:creator: crob
item.content:encoded:
Providing the best possible service during your visit is our highest priority. Time allotted for your appointment is reserved especially for you! We respect your time and ask the same of you.
Rescheduling & Cancellation Policy: Clients are expected to provide a full 24 hours notice when rescheduling their appointment to avoid a cancellation fee of 50% of the scheduled service.
No Show Policy: Clients who fail to show up for their appointment will be responsible for the full cost of treatment.
Late Arrival Policy: Arriving more than 20 minutes late is considered a “No Show.” We may not have time to perform your treatment and you will be responsible for the full cost of the treatment. Please call if you are running late.
Appointment Confirmations & Reminders: You will receive an email and/or text confirmation at the time of booking and an email and/or text reminder 24 hours before your appointment.
Product Return Policy: Unopened products may be returned for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Used products may be returned for product credit within 14 days of purchase.
We understand that things come up that prevent you from making it to your appointment and schedule adjustments are necessary. When you cancel on short notice, it prevents another client who needs treatment from coming in during that time spot. If you must cancel, be sure to give 24 hours notice or you will be charged the cancellation fee of 50% of the service.
Exceptions are made in certain cases such as emergencies and illness. If you are sick, please stay home.

After eight years she moved to the premier hotel in San Diego as Spa Director, where she earned awards for Best Luxury Spa in 2014 and Reader’s Choice Best Beach Spa Award by Spa Finder in 2015. In 2015, her passion for the spa industry led her to purchase her own business, Lavender Day Spa at another one of San Diegos Top Resort & Casino, established in 2002. She is passionate about providing a peaceful and nurturing spa experience to all guests through the talented staff members at Lavender Day Spa. “Our goal is to provide an exceptional experience for every guest, every time.” Jill Johnson "][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Lash Extension FAQ
item.dc:creator: crob
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_toggle title="Are Eyelash Extensions safe?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473201829794-e2357153-ff54" use_custom_heading="true"]Currently the FDA does not regulate Eyelash Extensions because they are applied to the natural eyelash hairs and do not touch the skin (or SHOULD NOT). The application process is pain-free and relaxing that most clients fall asleep during the procedure. However, improper application by an unqualified eyelash technician can cause damage to your natural lashes. We recommend only using a Certified Eyelash Extension Specialist. Make sure to do your homework and only get your lashes done by a licensed Esthetician or Cosmetologist who has completed PROPER Lash Training/Certification. After all they are your eyes, you deserve the best![/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Can anyone apply lash extensions?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202129845-538b1d07-3d69" use_custom_heading="true"]Licensing varies State to State. Most reputable lash extension companies will only certify licensed beauty professionals. The States of MO, KS, OK & AR Board of Barbers and Cosmetology requires ALL individuals who apply eyelash extensions to be licensed Estheticians or Cosmetologists.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Can Lash Extensions Harm Natural Lashes?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202151916-ca395fb2-938a" use_custom_heading="true"]When applied properly, lash extensions will not harm natural lashes. The fabuLASH & Faces extension application technique allows natural lashes to grow and thrive with extensions. We will never apply long or heavy extensions causing damage to your natural lashes. We apply lashes directly to the natural lash, never to the skin. We do not clump lashes together or damage your natural lashes with an improper application. The procedure is pain free and the extensions are feather light, so they will not damage your natural lashes. The health of your natural lashes is our top priority. *If you are accustomed to wearing clusters/individuals/flares or strips we’ll need to see your lashes in person to evaluate if our eyelash extensions are a good fit for you. Please schedule a CONSULTATION.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="What can I expect?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202194552-2a121bfb-e288" use_custom_heading="true"]We apply individual one-to-one lash extensions, no cluster lashes. We carry a variety of lengths, curvatures, thicknesses, and materials. Most of the lashes we carry are black, but fashion colors are available. A full set is generally a 2.5 hour appointment. After the initial consultation where we look at pictures, talk about your lashes and your desires, we’ll begin. A full set is roughly 80-120 lashes per eye, however we do not count lashes for pricing purposes, it is for informative purposes only. Please arrive without eye makeup. If you wear contacts, you will want to take them out before your appointment begins. [/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Can I wear mascara?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202210595-3a02d40c-9da4" use_custom_heading="true"]No. Wearing mascara will reduce the longevity of your extensions and you will need to schedule fills more often. We charge extra to clean out your lashes. You can wear mascara on the bottom lashes ONLY, however, you must remove all your eye makeup before you go to sleep because this is best for your skin AND your makeup will goop up the base of your extensions and cause your extensions to come off prematurely.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Can I still wear eye makeup?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202224089-759ca54e-d160" use_custom_heading="true"]Yes, but most clients don't even feel the need to wear eye makeup...Just wake up and go! No more “raccoon eyes”, running, streaking, smudging, clumpy or flaking mascara. You can use eyeliner and eye shadows as usual, provided it is NOT waterproof or liquid, as these products will break down the adhesive. NO MASCARA, as this will break down the adhesive, clump up the extensions and cause your extensions to come off earlier than expected.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Are they waterproof?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202228344-8a753cde-9885" use_custom_heading="true"]Yes! You can shower and swim in them! It is advisable to wait at least 24 hours prior to wetting your extensions to allow the adhesive to cure. Extensions exposed to water too soon will cause the adhesive to hyper-polymerize (dry too quickly) making them brittle. No saunas or steam rooms, please.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="How fast will I lose my lash extensions?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202266038-0090e169-196a" use_custom_heading="true"]There are 2 ways that you lose lashes:
a.) The average person, whether they have lash extensions or not, loses 25-30% of their natural lashes in a 2-3 week period. So when your natural lash sheds, it takes the extension with it. It may feel like you are losing more natural lashes than normal. Probably not. You are just more aware of it. Your natural lash isn’t that big. We are adding 4-5mm to your lashes, as well as girth! You will see them, in the bathroom sink, on your pillowcase, etc. – it’s totally normal! b.) The other way you lose lashes is through the breakdown of adhesive. This is usually from oil or from rubbing and touching the lashes. Be sure that your cleanser is oil-free, and no rubbing of the eyes! When clients have oily skin or seem to have some issues with keeping their extensions, we try to work with them to see what the problem is and how...[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Why Does It Cost So Much?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202318045-f5d50576-6b73" use_custom_heading="true"]The major investment in Eyelash Extensions consists of the initial full set. The application of Eyelash Extensions is an art form, and just as with hair styling and cutting, it can cost a bit more to have your lashes styled by the best. Once the initial set has been completed, touch-ups are nominal by beauty industry standards.
A typical Eyelash Extensions fill application costs substantially less than the initial application. Given this, the cost of maintaining your eyelash extensions indefinitely is really quite comparable to the cost of fills on acrylic nails, highlighting your hair, or even your daily Starbucks habit.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="How do I prepare for my appointment?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202346955-6265756b-2cde" use_custom_heading="true"]Please arrive with your eyes free of any eye makeup and have your lashes freshly cleansed and rinsed free of any detergent. Avoid caffeine or stimulants a minimum of 5 hours prior to your appointment. Your eyes involuntarily move and stimulants will increase this action. For service, it is crucial we have a steady surface to work with to give you a quality result.
Go to the gym before, NOT AFTER, your lash appointment! We recommend waiting 24 hours before getting your lashes wet. Not waiting 24 hours may cause the adhesive to reactivate and clump the lashes together or worse, fall off your lashes faster. Remove your contacts before the service begins.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="How many extensions are applied for each application? " style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202378891-d9ae1c9d-9404" use_custom_heading="true"]We schedule appointments based on time rather than by counting lashes. We do not count how many eyelash extensions applied per eye, but if we were to estimate it would likely be between 80-120 lash extensions per eye (lpe) for Classic Eyelash Extensions. The number of extensions applied depends on how many natural lashes you have on each eye and the health and/or condition of your natural eyelashes. Everyone’s lashes are different and we meticulously isolate each individual healthy eyelash hair for one extension. Other factors include how many extensions you’ve kept on from our previous appointment, and how many natural lashes you have shed.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="I have a special occasion, when should I get my lashes applied?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202406031-5a13cab8-8fe0" use_custom_heading="true"]Please schedule your appointment 2 – 3 weeks prior to your event. By planning your appointment in advance, we will be able to accommodate any adjustments to the appearance of your lashes; including curl, length, volume or shape.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="I’m had lashes applied by another lash artist, may I schedule a fill with you? " style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202418880-c262cbbf-c98d" use_custom_heading="true"]We love doing your lashes as much as you love your lashes. We strive to give you the best results for your dollar, and this can only be ensured by not going over another salon’s work.
If your current eyelash extensions are from another salon and/or you are past the 5-week mark between touch-up appointments, you will need to have your current extensions completely removed. The removal process is approximately 15-45 minutes depending on your current extensions. Our removal process is FREE of CHARGE when you schedule your new Full Set appointment at the same time. If you are in the unfortunate situation of having been a recipient of a eyelash extension disaster, we would love to help.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Scheduling Appointments " style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202462607-7ba43fc9-bb08" use_custom_heading="true"]The online schedule reflects available appointment times. If you do not see an opening for a particular time, day, or month; it is because we are already booked. We encourage you to check back frequently as cancellations do occur and will be reflected online. [/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=" What is your cancellation & late arrival policy?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202491115-03c9d0d6-1d18" use_custom_heading="true"]In the event that you need to cancel or reschedule, we require 24 hours advance notice. Appointments cancelled in less than the required time will be billed 50% of each service.
No shows are billed at full price.
One complimentary 2 week fill is provided with the purchase of a full set of eyelash extensions. In the event that you need to cancel or reschedule your free fill, we require 24 hours advance notice. If you do not cancel or reschedule within that time frame or you simply do not show for your appointment, you have forfeited your complimentary fill. Late Arrivals - Your session may be shortened in order to accommodate others whose appointments follow yours. Depending upon how late you arrive, we will determine if there is enough time remaining to start a treatment.[/vc_toggle][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Acne Treatment FAQ
item.dc:creator: crob
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_toggle title="What Makes Us Different?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473201829794-e2357153-ff54" use_custom_heading="true"]First, we analyze your skin to make sure you are getting the products at the proper potency. If the products are too weak they will not work or if they are too strong your skin may become dry and irritated. We will be sure to get the products just right and guide you through these changes over a 12-16 week timeframe. If we did not make these bi-weekly adjustments your skin would stop improving. As your personal Acne Specialist, I will help you tackle your acne in a customized, week by week way. Our Face Reality program provides you with strong products and a customized regimen while not over drying your skin. Our in-office acne treatments also speed up the process and with our support our clients find that their skin is clear in a few months.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Are the products natural? " style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202129845-538b1d07-3d69" use_custom_heading="true"]Yes. 99% of our ingredients are naturally occurring acids, antiseptic oils, and potent fruit botanicals. Some products may have some stabilizers added to the formula but you will not find any damaging chemicals here. In fact, all of our active serums have antioxidant benefits for maximum skin nutrition. [/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Can I use this system if I’m pregnant?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202151916-ca395fb2-938a" use_custom_heading="true"]Yes! Pregnancy can wreak havoc on a woman’s skin and all too often she is left with ineffective treatment options. Our products are potent but natural so they are safe to use even while pregnant or breast-feeding. We will provide you with a list of your home care items and their ingredients to show to your doctor for added peace of mind.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Can I just buy your products and skip the treatments? " style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202194552-2a121bfb-e288" use_custom_heading="true"]No, we do require a consultation and full treatment before selling you our products. Because of the potency, a sensitivity test will need to be performed. When clients skip treatments the skin does not get re-trained and it is unlikely to get good results. Having the products is not enough! The results come with the proper routine. We will show you how to use your products slowly at first so that you skin is responsive but does not get irritated or breakout. Usually within 2 weeks of starting with your new Face Reality regimen your skin will get used to what you are doing so we will need to “amp up” the regimen. This may mean adding another product, increasing frequency of use of a product you are currently using or layering a few active products.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="What happens after I get clear? Am I cured?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202210595-3a02d40c-9da4" use_custom_heading="true"]It depends on you! We have an after-care plan that is designed to keep your acne gone, so if you keep using the tools we provide and come in for regular maintenance treatments you will have continuously clear skin. If you go back to using pore-clogging ingredients the acne will of course come back. There is no cure for acne, only ways to manage it.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="What are the treatments like?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202224089-759ca54e-d160" use_custom_heading="true"]This is where the magic happens. Your skin will be thoroughly cleansed, exfoliated with specific enzymes and fruit acids, extractions will be performed, and we will restore vital nutrients back into the pores to calm inflammation. During the treatments we monitor your progress and modify the home care guidelines to keep challenging the skin so that it never gets immune to your products.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Does my diet affect my skin?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202228344-8a753cde-9885" use_custom_heading="true"]Absolutely. Acne is an inherited condition but can be greatly affected by your diet. During your treatments we discuss your diet to identify problematic foods or ingredients. Often times there are certain vitamins and minerals that we can provide to reduce oil production and calm inflammation.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Why do certain acne products work for some people but not for me?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202266038-0090e169-196a" use_custom_heading="true"]There are many forms of acne, many possible triggers, and your skin is unique to you. If you are experiencing inflamed, painful lesions but your friend has tiny white bumps you shouldn’t expect that her acne medicine will work for you. In fact, using the wrong products can make breakouts worse so be careful whose advice you take. You need a unique regimen suited to your skin to get clear.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=" How are we different than dermatologists?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202346955-6265756b-2cde" use_custom_heading="true"]Dermatologists tend to prescribe a “one size fits all” regimen of oral antibiotics, topical prescription creams such as Retin-A (which contains pore clogging inactive ingredients), Benzyl Peroxide and topical antibiotics. When this approach ends up failing a few months later, the doctor will then prescribe a round of new antibiotics and then another until they come to a point where nothing is working and the last resort is Accutane (isotretinoin). Not only do these prescriptions fail to cure the acne they also cause health-depleting side effects such as constipation, diarrhea, liver damage, depression and many more.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="What about ProActiv?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202378891-d9ae1c9d-9404" use_custom_heading="true"]This skin care line has the right idea but the products are so strong that they typically cause dryness, redness, itching and an initial “purging” breakout. Plus, your skin will get used to products over time will need more aggressive products every few weeks to keep acne from developing. For those who make it past the dryness and irritation, the skin may get clear for a short time but typically this is only temporary.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="How are we different than day spas and traditional estheticians?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202406031-5a13cab8-8fe0" use_custom_heading="true"]Most estheticians are not “Acne Specialists”. It takes specialized continuing education and training outside of a basic Esthetician license program to learn how to effectively work with acne-prone skin. Estheticians are primarily trained in facial techniques and the biology of the skin. Day spas and estheticians may even offer a few acne products but they most likely will contain pore-clogging ingredients that can make your acne worse simply maintain the acne instead of clearing it. The Face Reality program that we use is the only line sold only by their trained Acne Specialists and only non-pore clogging focused acne line.[/vc_toggle][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Hair Removal FAQ
item.dc:creator: crob
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_toggle title="Does Sugaring/Waxing hurt?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473201829794-e2357153-ff54" use_custom_heading="true"]There is generally some discomfort with hair removal. However, it is a quick, temporary sting that stops hurting right away and believe us when we say that the anticipation is much worse than the actual removal! It tends to hurt more the first time than any other time because your nerves are on edge and you don’t know what to expect. The pain lessens if you keep up with regular maintenance because the hair typically grows back finer and more sparse, becomes less prickly, and the skin retains its smoothness much longer.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="What's the Difference Between a $10 brow wax at a Nail Salon and Your Eyebrow Styling?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202129845-538b1d07-3d69" use_custom_heading="true"]High quality wax. High quality pre and post products for healthier skin. More time spent shaping so you get a fuller brow that's may also need to be nicely trimmed. Specialized, individual attention for every client, not a "One Size Fits All" approach to Eyebrow styling. You're welcome.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="How long does Sugaring/Waxing last?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202151916-ca395fb2-938a" use_custom_heading="true"]Sugaring: For the best results, book your appointments when the hair is 1/8" long, usually 3 - 4 weeks between appointments. Waxing: For the best results, book your appointments when the hair is 1/4" - 1/2" long, usually 2-3 weeks between appointments. As you continue to receive regular maintenance, the hair will begin to grow at a slower rate and be thinner, eventually leading to more time between maintenance sessions. So to make sure you're always at your hair free best, make sure you book your return appointments before you leave[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="When will the hair grow back?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202194552-2a121bfb-e288" use_custom_heading="true"]Generally most clients will get about two weeks of nice smooth soft skin after their hair removal. However clients that have been shaving on a frequent basis or clients that have used hair removal creams often find that it can take a few appointments to get a smooth finish. If you decide that you are going to maintain your body hair removal then you really should have regular appointments every 3-4 weeks to keep the area smooth and hair free. Regular appointments are easier as the hair regrowth is much finer and a lot easier to remove.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Are there any age restrictions on waxing?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202210595-3a02d40c-9da4" use_custom_heading="true"]Yes, you must be 18 or older to receive a hair removal service at our studio. If you are under the age of 18, just have a parent or guardian fill out our consent form and we will be happy to provide services to you.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Are there any reasons I should not be sugared or waxed?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202224089-759ca54e-d160" use_custom_heading="true"]You should not receive any hair removal services if you are using the following products: Accutane, Retin A, Renova, Differin. If you have been or plan to be out in the sun within 24-48 hours before or after an appointment, or are sun burned, you should not receive services.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="How will my skin react to sugaring or waxing?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202228344-8a753cde-9885" use_custom_heading="true"]After your first wax, the skin may be a bit red and irritated. This is normal and should calm down within a few hours. Please keep in mind that no matter how many precautions are taken it is difficult to predict how everyone’s skin may react, e.g. bruising and peeling.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="What about ingrown hairs?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202266038-0090e169-196a" use_custom_heading="true"]As with all hair removal methods how you maintain your skin afterwards will make a huge difference. We will provide our clients with some good aftercare advice. Follow the guidelines and use the recommended products on your skin.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="How sanitary is the hair removal process?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202318045-f5d50576-6b73" use_custom_heading="true"]Double-dipping is a common practice at many salons, but not at fabuLASH & Faces. Our waxing sticks are dipped into the wax once, applied to the client once, and then discarded. fabuLASH & Faces tries to be as environmentally friendly as possible; we are aware using multiple sticks creates excess waste, but sanitation is our top priority. We value being as sanitary as possible. For all services below the head, gloves are worn to protect the safety of both our clients and our service providers.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="How do I make this easier?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202346955-6265756b-2cde" use_custom_heading="true"]First of all, be consistent. As you are consistently sugaring/waxing every four weeks- your hair becomes thinner, finer, and sparser! This results in a less painful appointment. Get on a consistent schedule and stick to it! Year round is ideal. Try to avoid caffeine before your appointment, as caffeine is a stimulant, and can make your skin more sensitive. Exfoliate your skin before you come in; we advise starting a couple of days ahead of time. We also suggest scheduling your first appointment right after your period. Your pain threshold is higher during that time, and you'll be more comfortable. Stop shaving! We like you to come see us (about 10 days for sugaring & 3 weeks for waxing) after your last shave because shaving can make the hair more resistant to removal.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Can I reschedule/cancel my appointment?" style="rounded_outline" custom_font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left" custom_use_theme_fonts="yes" el_id="1473202378891-d9ae1c9d-9404" use_custom_heading="true"]We kindly ask for a minimum of 4 hours notice for any cancellations or rescheduling of HAIR REMOVAL SERVICE appointments. If you do not call to cancel an appointment at least 4 hours prior to, an automatic $15 will be charged to your account and must be paid prior to receiving your next service. Also, as our services tend to be quick- no reason to prolong the pain, right?!- if you are more than 5 minutes late for your scheduled appointment please be aware that we may have to reschedule you for a later time. These policies are in place simply to protect our other clients’ time.[/vc_toggle][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

We believe that massages aren't a luxury; they are body maintenance, pure and simple.

Massage therapy helps you relax, re-align and rejuvenate. item.excerpt:encoded: Eyelash Extensions is a practice that enhances the length, thickness and fullness of natural eyelashes. The extensions may consist of silk, mink, or synthetic hair. Methods of applying the extensions include individual and one-by-one extensions. False eyelashes and Eyelash 'Extensions' are not the same. Eyelash Extensions must be applied one by one to avoid having them stick together.

item.excerpt:encoded: Eyelash Extensions is a practice that enhances the length, thickness and fullness of natural eyelashes. The extensions may consist of silk, mink, or synthetic hair. Methods of applying the extensions include individual and one-by-one extensions. False eyelashes and Eyelash 'Extensions' are not the same. Eyelash Extensions must be applied one by one to avoid having them stick together.

item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

item.title: Hydrating Masque
item.dc:creator: crob
item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.
